description:
Reference the code here: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/context.py#L40

The checked attribute is "is_admin", but the fallback check sets an attribute named "admin" which is not used anywhere else. Line 41 should be altered to read "self.is_admin = 'admin' in self.roles".
title: RequestContext is_admin fallback sets wrong attribute

comments.content:

comments.content:
Hi Gabriel,

The nova code mirrored on GitHub is a bit out of sync. Nova is still using Launchpad for code hosting.

I fixed this issue in bzr 1509. You can get the latest code by checking out the bzr tree on LP:

  bzr branch lp:nova

Also, Nova code hosting is switching to GitHub very soon. So stay tuned for that too.
